edu.ucsc.cross.hse.core.modeling

Class HybridSystemComponents<X extends DataStructure>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsc.cross.hse.core.modeling.HybridSystemComponents<X>

  • public class HybridSystemComponents<X extends DataStructure>
extends java.lang.Object
    The internal components of a hybrid system. This currently includes only the functional components of the hybrid system and basic a basic API. The purpose of this class consolidate the internal components of the hybrid system and API into a separate class to avoid mixing them with user defined components and methods of hybrid system extensions Intended Operator: User

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) X dynamicState
      State used to store the derivative values of the state during flows or the updated state values after a jump.
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> parameters
      List of additional object sets that are associated with the particular hybrid system
      (package private) X state
      The current state of the system
